member.name: T:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.VisualStudio.SinceVs14.Daemon.ResharperDaemonVsBulbRemover
member.summary: Hide VS14+ Bulb margin, if R# does not support current document language.

summary.para: Remove all unnecessary stuff from VS ISuggestedAction.DisplayText.
It seems that suggested action text could contain a piece of source code with new lines (at least VS LightBulb class expects it.)
Underscore '_' can be used as an accelerator symbol. If suggestion text contains underscores VS quotes them with another underscore.

member.summary: If we're going to replace VS rich quick info, we have to add any content to the session before QuickInfoCommandHandlerAndSourceProvider.QuickInfoSource is called.
